Kalititi grew around a series of natural springs, and is comprised <span class="tip dotted" title=" Tiefling: 21.93%, Dragonborn: 19.01%, Half-Elf: 17.84%, Halfling: 11.70%, Gnome: 11.11%, Goblin: 9.94%, Half-Orc: 5.26%, Dwarf: 3.22%, Elf: 0.00%, Human: 0.00%">of a melting pot of all different races</span>. town: <br><span class="first-character">K</span>alititi is located in the tropical jungle, where the vegetation is thick. Kalititi grew around a series of natural springs. They harvest fish, and nearby is a region rich with rare fauna used in alchemy.They are an <span class="tip dotted" title="Trade and industry are controlled by private owners for profit, rather than the state.">capitalist</span> <span class="tip dotted" title="Governed by the best.">meritocratic</span> <span class="tip dotted" title="The crown holds supreme judicial power, but day to day affairs are held by parliament.">constitutional monarchy</span>. The nearest <span class="tip" title="This changes each time you click."><a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">landmark</a></span> is <span id="random">a frozen lake with a polished ice surface. If you look closely enough, you can see dead floating beneath the surface.</span> A population of 3650, the denizens live a poor existence. A trial is currently taking place.<br><h3>Government in Kalititi</h3>The people of Kalititi work in exchange for payment from their employers, which they use to buy the necessities. Mr <span class="tip" id="6b9a1d0a-8ec0-40fa-8480-411322714c8f"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Zephan Amarzian</a></span> is the head of state, but affairs are handled by the competent, the head of whom is Mr <span class="tip" id="f5829d98-e88e-411d-af2a-8dc0d38a9d3d"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Valafar Menetrian</a></span>.<br><h4>Economics</h4>Trade is free in Kalititi, and people live a poor existence because of it. There are no taxes or regulations to speak of. Welfare is bad. Citizens can expect the bare minimum of death services. Healthcare and education are fringe cases, and citizens would do better to seek a private benefactor than try and receive treatment from the government. <h4>Law and Order</h4>There's a decent policing presence, and citizens know better than to step out of line, as <span class="tip" id="efef4ec2-d90d-4f65-964d-628ae9ec6ce5"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Kalititi Maul</a></span> are armed. Despite this, brutality is rare, and citizens with nothing to hide have nothing to fear. Law in Kalititi is reform-based, and those that breach the laws can expect fines, penalties, or work-release programs to provide them with the best possible chance to not become a recidivist. Magic is reserved only for those with a license, which is a relatively simple form to fill out, stating what type of magic you wish to practice, your contact details, a non-refundable bond to cover public liability, and whether it's for commercial or personal use.<br><span class="macro-linkappend"><h3>Racial Demographics</h3></span> <div class="classTable" id="races"><span class="macro-live <td>7</td> <td>0.19</td> <td><a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Create an urchin</a>     </td></tr></table>Total: 45.92% of the total population.

6a3e1f12-11e5-4c8a-b844-41e5913b04aa.name: The Town Square
6a3e1f12-11e5-4c8a-b844-41e5913b04aa.output: <h1>The Town Square</h1><br>You're in the town square. It's huge and hectic, and relatively tidy. It features a large plaque in the center of the square dedicated to the town's general wealth. As you walk through the square, you see a large cage with a lion inside of it.<br>There's a <span class="tip" id="2c1a4a23-bf1c-4c38-9d08-4a6723b705a4"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">scrawny gnome</a></span> who is preaching the good word of Lathander. There's also a noticeboard, which has various posters, requests, and announcements tacked to it.<br><br><br><br><span class="macro-live macro-live-block"><div id="poster"></div></span>

4d8e18c4-04b2-4acf-9302-8f2931700549.name: The Markets
4d8e18c4-04b2-4acf-9302-8f2931700549.output: <h1>The Markets</h1>You wander through the streets of Kalititi, and come across the market, which is located in the very center of town. It seems that the vendors are organised by whoever got to what spot first. The market is known for having every type of food imaginable, and is a victim to the chaos that is so common in markets. Today the market is incredibly busy, and people are piled up at different stalls all trying to look at the goods on display.<br><br><h3>Merchants</h3> <br>Off to the side, a  <span class="tip" id="9d4bb0c9-a0e0-4686-aace-4b23e42c4853"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">weedy male gnome</a></span> is shouting out "Never forget another note! Buy my self playing instruments! You'd be a fool to pass it up!" from a ramshackle storefront.<br><br>Nearby, a  <span class="tip" id="420b048f-de60-40c1-b03d-516634570130"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">quite diminutive woman with small, protruding ears</a></span> is selling snakeskin boots from a pile of dirty rags laid on the ground.<br><br>A  <span class="tip" id="13eac418-5d49-4fe3-9bba-72e87668eb23"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">rather solidly built female tiefling</a></span> is calling "Guaranteed dragon bones! Essential for the intrepid adventurer!" from a pile of dirty rags laid on the ground.<br><br>Off to the side, a  <span class="tip" id="ea9e93d0-313c-4f2d-b3b0-bce67cad3c58"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">rather solidly built female tiefling</a></span> is calling "Wear a wig, look quite big! Best price in all the lands!" from a makeshift looking booth.<br><br><br><br>

6995e273-ca70-427d-b608-78884d273eb4.name: The Old Road Botany shop
6995e273-ca70-427d-b608-78884d273eb4.output: <h1>The Old Road Botany shop</h1><br><span class="first-character">Y</span>ou come inside a plaster building with a hole riddled thatched roof called The Old Road Botany shop. You notice a single potted daisy sitting on the shop counter.<br><br>This florist shop is known for the large variety of seeds that they offer. There is a <span class="tip" id="ea1e9da8-6619-4ef7-9956-6abbb7f527fe"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">withered goblin</a></span> currently carefully arranging a bouquet of begonias and roses. 34200405-faad-4d94-aad8-6a623aecbb44.name: The Abbey of Grace
34200405-faad-4d94-aad8-6a623aecbb44.output: <br><h1>The Abbey of Grace</h1><span class="first-character">Y</span>ou come across A crumbling plaster abbey with a thatched roof. This abbey is protected by a sworn order of devout warriors.<br>You enter the small, very messy abbey and notice a deep earthy smell coming from some nearby incense. The main room is triangular in shape and is decorated with mostly destitute looking holy symbols. The interior walls of the abbey are made of smooth cut stone and the the ceiling is painted with mythological scenes. The abbey was designed by the local priest`s wife and it is simple with an intricate complex hidden beneath the main worship chamber.<br><br>Within this holy place they pray to several gods within a pantheon to whom the temple was not originally dedicated. The temple itself was originally dedicated to Sune and is known for sliding down a hillside.<br><br><h3>Priest</h3><br>A temple priest is seemingly talking to the open air as no one is around her.<br>The priest greets you, and introduces herself as <span class="tip" id="79045646-3911-46dc-9bad-6fb5d299d349"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Decarabia Romazi</a></span>. She says there are beds in a backroom that you all can use for a night if you need.<br><br><h6>Blessing</h6><br><div class="descriptive">The priest has you hold a small holy statue while $associatedNPC.heShe mumbles a holy blessing. After all that the priest tells you that your body has become heat resistant for the next day or so.</div><br><span class="macro-linkappend"><h4>Buy something</h4></span>          \ 39422770-b4d2-4282-9dc4-966a82e52e71.name: The Holy Temple of Monks
39422770-b4d2-4282-9dc4-966a82e52e71.output: <br><h1>The Holy Temple of Monks</h1><span class="first-character">Y</span>ou come across A poorly made split log temple with a red black shingled roof. This temple is protected by a sworn order of devout warriors.<br>You enter the small, extremely messy temple and notice large stone stairs leading down to a pool of clear water. The main room is triangular in shape and is decorated with mostly poor looking relics. The interior walls of the temple are made of unfinished hardwood and the the ceiling is painted with mythological scenes. The temple was designed by the father of the local priest and it is arranged in a concentric fashion; the inner areas are inaccessible to most visitors.<br><br>Within this holy place they pray to several gods within a pantheon to whom the temple was not originally dedicated. The temple itself was originally dedicated to Liliira and is known for only letting in true believers into the inner rooms.<br><br><h3>Priest</h3><br>A temple priest is doing some kind of work on the temple organ.<br>The priest greets you, and introduces himself as <span class="tip" id="fdcdb46e-fcf3-40a4-8c38-b74146ad30cd"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Zepar Vadu</a></span>. He offers you a cracker from a small wicker basker.<br><br><h6>Blessing</h6><br><div class="descriptive">Zepar pours water over your body from a large stone goblet while whispering an ancient blessing. Afterwards, Zepar apologizes and says the blessing failed.</div><br><span class="macro-linkappend"><h4>Buy something</h4></span>          \ <table><tr><th>Item</th><th>Cost</th></tr><h6>Adventuring They are involved with a certain bloodline.<br><br><h3>Governance</h3>It's ruled by     <span class="tip" id="9a59fe23-e51f-4637-91ed-b98f82687e82"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Nogu Bracka</a></span>, who was able to oust the previous leadership. a1246cd7-4d33-4e56-aab9-9f08591eb734.output: <h1>The Factory</h1><br><span class="first-character">T</span>he Factory is a craftsmen guild. It's very new, and the quite large faction has an excellent reputation, and is motivated by money. They are suspected in the disappearance of a well known figure.<br><br><h3>Governance</h3>It's ruled by     a committee of 8, who were the first appointed leaders. They are usually competent, and their positions on the committee are stable due to their much-loved committee. Their meetings are held every day, at 5pm sharp, and are are open to people accompanied by a member. Bribes to the committee are a regular part of business.   <br><h3>Members</h3><br>Members of The Factory are identifiable by their excessively bureaucratic tendencies. Membership requires referral by an existing member, and costs twenty gold pieces. efef4ec2-d90d-4f65-964d-628ae9ec6ce5.name: The Kalititi Maul
efef4ec2-d90d-4f65-964d-628ae9ec6ce5.output: <h1>The Kalititi Maul</h1><br><span class="first-character">T</span>he Kalititi Maul is a guards watch. It's quite new, and the slightly below average sized faction has an excellent reputation, and is motivated by money. They are rumoured to be under investigation.<br><h3>Policing</h3><br>Kalititi is policed by The Kalititi Maul, rather than a separate guard. The guard is quite underfunded, and their equipment is always in disrepair. Their officers are held accountable for their actions only when public pressure calls for it, though The Kalititi Maul does not have the funding to perform any training exercises.<br><br>One can recognise a member of The Kalititi Maul by the violet and purple livery adorned with an image of a bat.<br><h4>Law in Kalititi</h4><br>Law in Kalititi is reform-based, and those that breach the laws can expect fines, penalties, or work-release programs to provide them with the best possible chance to not become a recidivist.<br><h3>Governance</h3>It's ruled by     <span class="tip" id="058f7c14-e3fd-488b-924f-46f9744c4979"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Anakis Domarien</a></span>, who was able to rise to power through nepotism. She is somewhat incompetent, and her position is mostly stable. Bribes are uncommon, and frowned upon. <br><h3>Members</h3><br>Members of The Kalititi Maul are identifiable by their excessively bureaucratic tendencies. Membership requires some social status, and costs a hundred gold pieces. 028e698f-ad66-4f5c-bf47-47de5d2075cf.name: Resh Bracka
028e698f-ad66-4f5c-bf47-47de5d2075cf.output: <br><span class="first-character">R</span>esh Bracka is <span class="tip dotted" title="59 years old, to be exact.">an aged</span> male half-orc. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 5″">short-ish</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="182lbs. (with a BMI of 25)">rather solidly built</span>, and has amber eyes with fair skin. The most notable physical trait of Resh is that he has a ring of thorns tattoo.<br><br>Resh drinks too much. When he is relaxed, he is confident. In moments of stress, he becomes impractical. Religion-wise, Resh is an outspoken believer. <br><br>Resh has recently been successful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="A robber or outlaw belonging to a gang and typically operating in an isolated or lawless area.">bandit</span>, with a background of being a commoner. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Resh lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Resh currently has a ring of iron keys in his pockets, and  70 Gold 3 Silver 6 Copper to his name. In combat, he uses a dagger. Resh knows Common and Orc. <br>Resh currently earns  1 Gold 1 Silver 1 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 2 Silver 1 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 1 Silver 1 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Resh lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>               <tr><td>Money owed by <span class="tip" id="79045646-3911-46dc-9bad-6fb5d299d349"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Decarabia Romazi</a></span></td><td> 32 Gold</td></tr>      </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born $currentNPC.birthplace, and was raised by $currentNPC.familyUnit, along with my $currentNPC.siblingNumber siblings. I had  upbringing in $currentNPC.familyHome.  $currentNPC.childhoodMemories.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a bandit</div><div class="descriptive">"I was one of many children, and had to work from a young age to support my family. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being a bandit I am the fifth child and will not inherit anything. I need to find somewhere I can settle down. The rich need to be shown what life and death are like in the gutters."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I got an autograph from a famous painter in my travels.        I spent some time working as a bandit.<br>        Not to mention there was the time I was falsely accused of theft, but eventually was acquitted. 58ba2605-5e21-445a-ae20-dae0f019d01f.name: Armara Amarzian
58ba2605-5e21-445a-ae20-dae0f019d01f.output: <br><span class="first-character">A</span>rmara Amarzian is <span class="tip dotted" title="35 years old, to be exact.">a mid thirties</span> female tiefling. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 3″">short</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="103lbs. (with a BMI of 18)">lithe</span>, and has red eyes with pale skin. The most notable physical trait of Armara is that she has rather hairy ears.<br><br>Armara is often sarcastic. When she is relaxed, she is foolish. In moments of stress, she becomes belligerent. Religion-wise, Armara is a casual observer. <br><br>Armara is slightly unsuccessful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Unlawfully occupies an uninhabited building or unused land.">squatter</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Armara lives a squalid existence, eating terrible food with no alcohol, and few creature comforts">paupery</span> social class. <br><br>Armara currently has a compass in her pockets, and  110 Gold 2 Silver 8 Copper to her name. In combat, she uses a dagger. Armara knows Common and Infernal. <br>Armara currently earns  1 Silver 2 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Armara lives a squalid existence, eating terrible food with no alcohol, and few creature comforts">squalid</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 1 Copper</td></tr>               <tr><td>Money owed by <span class="tip" id="9a59fe23-e51f-4637-91ed-b98f82687e82"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Nogu Bracka</a></span></td><td> 8 Gold 6 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>      </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a field, and was raised by my single mother as an only child. I had a squalid upbringing in a rundown shack. Both parents were human, with their infernal ancestry manifesting in me later in life. Others saw me as different, or strange, and so I had few companions.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a squatter</div><div class="descriptive">"I was the eldest child. When my father died, I had to leave school and work to support my family. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being a squatter When my mother died, I found a list of men in her possessions. One of them is my father. I'll find him. The low are lifted up"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time there was no other work so for a while I was a commoner.        You might not believe it, but as a young child I got lost in a twisting and winding maze for a month. I was found by a grinning warlock and have not really ventured out much since.<br>        I was falsely accused of smuggling, but eventually was acquitted. It took up years of my life, though, and I still get antsy around guards that I don't know.<br>    At one point, I met the love of my life, who is no longer with me.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th>       <th>Race</th>       <th>Occupation</th>       <th>Relationship</th>            </tr>          <tr>       <td><span class="tip" id="9a59fe23-e51f-4637-91ed-b98f82687e82"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Nogu Bracka</a></span></td>       <td>Half-orc</td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="A sneaky person.">Rogue</span></td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Armara is a debtor to Nogu">Creditor</span></td>            </tr>                  </table> </div> <br>

63d33873-1d51-4e72-b257-1ee17b19dfbb.output: <br><span class="first-character">J</span>asper Littlefoot is <span class="tip dotted" title="44 years old, to be exact.">an early middle aged</span> male halfling. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="3ft. 2″">diminutive</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="30lbs. (with a BMI of 14)">rather solidly built</span>, and has yellow eyes with tan skin. The most notable physical trait of Jasper is that he has a spade of a chin.<br><br>Jasper is a habitual liar. When he is relaxed, he is lazy. In moments of stress, he becomes destructive. Religion-wise, Jasper is an outspoken believer. <br><br>Jasper is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Turns stone, minerals, or gemstones into decorative items such as cabochons, engraved gems, and faceted designs.">lapidary</span>, with a background of being a commoner. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Jasper lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Jasper currently has 22 cp in his pockets, and  50 Gold 6 Silver 2 Copper to his name. In combat, he uses a dagger. Jasper knows Common and Halfling. He is mostly homosexual, but with more than a passing interest in the opposite sex, and has a wife, <span class="tip" id="f4e4cff0-3d8d-4756-85bd-f2b3fd8e64db"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Chenna Stoutbridge</a></span>.<br>Jasper currently earns  1 Gold 6 Silver 6 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 8 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 6 Silver 6 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Jasper lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 1 Silver 9 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born on an Outer Plane, and was raised by my single mother as an only child. I had a comfortable upbringing in a small house.  Others saw me as different, or strange, and so I had few companions.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a lapidary</div><div class="descriptive">"I was one of many children, and when I was old enough to work, my parents put me to it. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being a lapidary I know my lot in life; feudalism dictates that one should serve the other. I disagree, and will fight to my dying breath to change the system. You have to respect all people"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time there was no other work so for a while I was a commoner.        After being dragged along on a military campaign I was awarded a <span class="dotted">	 	 	<span class="tip dotted" title="This medal's emblem is made of steel and has a silk ribbon. The emblem is a pyramid and the ribbon is coloured teal.">medal</span> </span> for saving a superior officer from a fatal blow.I keep it above my fireplace to show my guests.<br>        Not to mention there was the time I met my <span class="tip" id="6fea4178-f5e1-4c81-82cb-8538c7296fc4"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">best buddy</a></span> on some travel.<br>        After that, I used to play cards in a pub, and one time supposedly cheated a <span class="tip" id="5190727a-9340-414d-9b0b-3fd40b91b4e4"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span> out of his winnings; I admit that I am at least partially at fault. I couldn't care less if he tries to do anything about it.<br>    At one point, I played a secondary part in a travelling play. I was a better performer than anyone else in the show.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th>       <th>Race</th> ea1e9da8-6619-4ef7-9956-6abbb7f527fe.output: <br><span class="first-character">W</span>awa Morkdork is <span class="tip dotted" title="61 years old, to be exact.">a withered</span> female goblin. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="4ft. 3″">quite squat</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="86lbs. (with a BMI of 23)">rather solidly built</span>, and has yellow eyes and a rather wild, unkempt beard, with light skin. The most notable physical trait of Wawa is that she has quite stumpy legs.<br><br>Wawa gossips about the most mundane things. When she is relaxed, she is eager. In moments of stress, she becomes reckless. Religion-wise, Wawa is a conspicuously faithful believer. <br><br>Wawa is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Grows and arranges plants and cut flowers.">florist</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Wawa lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Wawa currently has a deck of tarot cards in her pockets, and  130 Gold 4 Silver 6 Copper to her name. In combat, she uses a dagger. Wawa knows Common and Goblin. Wawa has a husband, <span class="tip" id="84c17754-a820-4fb8-b22c-302f7519a882"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Riggity Mazz</a></span>.<br>Wawa currently earns  1 Gold 8 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 2 Silver 1 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 8 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Wawa lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by my mother and father as an only child. I had a comfortable upbringing in a small house.  I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a florist</div><div class="descriptive">"I was one of many children, and when I was old enough to work, my parents put me to it. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being a florist My friends are my world. If my life consists of working for five days, then going to the tavern with my buddies, I will be content. The low are lifted up"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I apprenticed under <span class="tip" id="4c70a4f3-c941-4861-b111-ec2f422ae769"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Doudra Linxakasendalor</a></span> a mediocre cooper. During that time I learned a lot about the trade.        How could I ever forget the time to pay off a debt, I spent some time as a florist. <br>        Once I went to celebrate at a festival. While I was there, I watched several dance troupes compete in a competition.<br>        One time I did a stint as a commoner.<br>        After that, I traveled a great distance on pilgrimage to a town of heathens. I had waited my whole life for this, and I have found my place in my faith.<br>        You might not believe it, but I lost contact with an <span class="tip" id="c048ae0e-e963-4505-8bb7-2cdf9de06bfa"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">old friend</a></span>, and reconnected with <span class="tip" id="c048ae0e-e963-4505-8bb7-2cdf9de06bfa"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">him</a></span> on a pilgrimage.<br>        There was this one time, I struck out heading towards a crystal clear lake on the peak of a snowy mountain. I really did make it there, and I made some important discoveries while I was there. <br>        I went on a pilgrimage with a group to the birthplace of my god. I had waited my whole life for this, and my peers have respected me more since I returned.<br>    At one point, some friends and I went to a hero's festival. While I was there, I visited several brewing stalls and drank to my heart's content.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th> I had a comfortable upbringing in an apartment in a rundown neighborhood. One parent was a human, the other was a tiefling. I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a castellan</div><div class="descriptive">"I was one of many children, and when I was old enough to work, my parents put me to it. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being a castellan I had to sell a magical heirloom to pay off a debt. Now I want to buy it back. I'm going to prove that I'm worthy of a better life."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I saw the carriage of a <span class="tip" id="e18a561a-7273-4544-bdbf-04b1cada106a"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">noble</a></span> while traveling, and it was being pelted with rotten fruit by the starving peasants.        After that, I went on a journey to find the burial tomb of an ancient ruler on a floating dock in the ocean. I got lost along the way and never made it there, but I do not regret trying.<br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, because of a promise, I did some time as a commoner.<br>        After that, I went to a spring festival. While I was there, I watched a parade that was full of magical effects.<br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, I took part in a regional talent show with my comedy routine. I won first place and got a ton of prizes.<br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, I met a <span class="tip" id="69665d35-344d-492d-89f3-8efce541c484"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span>, and we played cards. He decided that I was cheating- I'll never say what really happened. I'll gut him like a fish if he crosses my path again.<br>        At one point I got an autograph from a famous stage actor while I was traveling.<br>    At one point, there was a civil war within the town that I fought in. I suffered only minor injuries, and the wounds all healed without leaving any scars.<br></div><br> <div class="classTable">   <h3>Relationships</h3>   <table>     <tr>       <th>Name</th>       <th>Race</th>       <th>Occupation</th>       <th>Relationship</th>            </tr>          <tr>       <td><span class="tip" id="0b4f15ae-62b3-4db3-9628-27fd461cb99e"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Uthemar Butler</a></span></td>       <td>Half-elf</td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="A person belonging to a class with high social or political status.">Noble</span></td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Qemud is a liege to Uthemar">Subject</span></td>            </tr>          <tr>       <td><span class="tip" id="5152fc76-7c82-4221-bac0-317e3af7ee81"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Lamlis Ash</a></span></td>       <td>Half-elf</td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="A young attendant to a person of noble rank.">Page</span></td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Qemud is a liege to Lamlis">Subject</span></td>            </tr>          <tr>       <td><span class="tip" id="69665d35-344d-492d-89f3-8efce541c484"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Iados Szereban</a></span></td>       <td>Tiefling</td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Operates a farm or cultivates land.">Farmer</span></td>       <td><span class="tip dotted" title="Qemud is an enemy to Iados">Enemy</span></td>            </tr>               <tr>       <th>Building Name</th>       <th>Building Type</th>              <th></th>       <th>Relationship</th>     </tr>          <td> <span class="tip" id="tip-the-hold-of-croft-NaN"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">The Hold of Croft</a> </span> </td>     <td>Hold</td>            <td></td>          <td>       <span class="tip dotted" title="The Hold of Croft is a castle he rules to Qemud">Castle He Rules</span>     </td>                  </table> </div> <br>

Theriatis knows Common and Elvish. <br>Theriatis currently earns  9 Silver 2 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 3 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 9 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Theriatis lives a poor life, having to count copper and save for purchases">poor</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 6 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by $currentNPC.familyUnit as an only child. I had  upbringing in $currentNPC.familyHome. One parent was a human, the other was an elf. $currentNPC.childhoodMemories.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a jailer</div><div class="descriptive">"I had a bad string of bets which left me with no other choice than to skip town. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being a jailer My father taught me how to read. All I want to do in life is to further my knowledge on how the world works. The rich need to be shown what life and death are like in the gutters."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time as a young child I got lost in a black cherry tree forest and I can not remember how long I was there. I was found by a gentle barbarian but not before I was roughed up by some bandits I ran into.        How could I ever forget the time I lost contact with an <span class="tip" id="68c25950-ea7c-4921-bac8-4c2e4044ae52"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">old friend</a></span>, and reconnected with <span class="tip" id="68c25950-ea7c-4921-bac8-4c2e4044ae52"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">her</a></span> on a pilgrimage. <br>        I forget exactly when, but at one point, I went to celebrate at a hero's festival. While I was there, I watched a fantastic play performed on a moving stage in the parade.<br>        There was this one time, for a while I did some work as a commoner. <br>        One time I used to play cards in a pub, and one time supposedly cheated a <span class="tip" id="0d32eaeb-537f-4c9a-9c0c-fce4fe3deded"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">man</a></span> out of his winnings; I'm ashamed to admit that I'm to blame. I don't exactly care to run into him again.<br>        There was this one time, while I was travelling through the heart of a black walnut forest, I came across a giant lion! The creature stalked me for the rest of the day. <br>        There was this one time, there were some goblin raids which I had to defend my town from. I managed to escape the battle unscathed, but many of my friends were killed or injured. <br>        I saved a wizard's life, and as a token of his thanks, he gave me a Benedictine Medallion of the Acolyte.<blockquote><h4>Benedictine Medallion of the Acolyte</h4>Contains 1d4 unreplenishable charges of the Healing Word spell (1st level). The bearer gains a +1 bonus to Wisdom (Religion) checks.</blockquote><br>        Oh, and I can't forget the time I was a novice to <span class="tip" id="86ab2af2-cbcf-4dab-8f49-766213998017"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Eberdeb Shadowcloak</a></span> an incredibly talented tailor. 4748eff1-af6e-4ed9-b747-e9a605df6e63.output: <br><span class="first-character">M</span>edrash Ophinshtalajiir is <span class="tip dotted" title="46 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> male dragonborn. He is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 7″">somewhat short</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="230lbs. (with a BMI of 33)">quite solidly built</span>, and has brown eyes with fair skin. The most notable physical trait of Medrash is that he has a scar on the throat.<br><br>Medrash drinks too much. He stutters. When he is relaxed, he is fearful. In moments of stress, he becomes argumentative. Religion-wise, Medrash is an open-minded seeker. <br><br>Medrash is slightly unsuccessful as an <span class="tip dotted" title="Extorts money from someone by threatening to expose embarrassing information about them.">extortioner</span>, with a background of being a commoner. He belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Medrash lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">peasantry</span> social class. <br><br>Medrash currently has 1pp wrapped in a crude map in his pockets, and  60 Gold 7 Silver 5 Copper to his name. In combat, he uses a dagger. Medrash knows Common and Draconic. <br>Medrash currently earns  1 Gold 7 Silver 1 Copper per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 8 Silver 7 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 8.5 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold 7 Silver 1 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Medrash lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td> 2 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>               <tr><td>Money owed by <span class="tip" id="c9d4ac26-ae92-410b-b0f7-91ebc006f2c0"> <a class="link-internal macro-link" tabindex="0">Abad Paradas</a></span></td><td> 124 Gold 8 Silver 4 Copper</td></tr>      </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a cave, and was raised by my single mother as an only child. I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming an extortioner</div><div class="descriptive">"I was the eldest child. When my father died, I had to leave school and work to support my family. My circumstances kept me from doing more than being an extortioner I am the fifth child and will not inherit anything. I need to find somewhere I can settle down. I help the people who help me– that's what keeps us alive."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I was nearly caught and convicted in the middle of selling contraband , but managed to escape. 420b048f-de60-40c1-b03d-516634570130.name: Jo Hogcollar
420b048f-de60-40c1-b03d-516634570130.output: <br><span class="first-character">J</span>o Hogcollar is <span class="tip dotted" title="51 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> female halfling. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="2ft. 11″">quite diminutive</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="30lbs. (with a BMI of 17)">scrawny</span>, and has ash gray eyes with pale skin. The most notable physical trait of Jo is that she has small, protruding ears.<br><br>Jo makes poor eye contact. When she is relaxed, she is devout. In moments of stress, she becomes compulsive. Religion-wise, Jo is a quiet true believer. <br><br>Perhaps due to sexism, Jo is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Jo lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Jo currently has a potion of Polymorph Self worth 350gp in her pockets, and  3 Silver 1 Copper to her name. Jo knows Common and Halfling. <br>Jo currently earns  1 Gold per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 1 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Jo lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born at home, and was raised by my mother and father with my brother. I had a modest upbringing in a village in the middle of the wilderness.  I had several friends, and my childhood was generally a happy one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a merchant</div><div class="descriptive">"I had a bad string of bets which left me with no other choice than to skip town. Some people just have the gift of the gab- I have a talent for sales. The lord that took my daughter as a guarantee for my debt never intended to return her. I intend to make him. We have to take care of each other"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...<br>     This one time I met the love of my life, who is no longer with me. 13eac418-5d49-4fe3-9bba-72e87668eb23.name: Armara Iscitan
13eac418-5d49-4fe3-9bba-72e87668eb23.output: <br><span class="first-character">A</span>rmara Iscitan is <span class="tip dotted" title="41 years old, to be exact.">a middle aged</span> female tiefling. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 2″">rather short</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="130lbs. (with a BMI of 23)">rather solidly built</span>, and has pale blue eyes with fair skin. The most notable physical trait of Armara is that she has an exceptionally pale face.<br><br>Armara is skeptical of everything. When she is relaxed, she is angry. In moments of stress, she becomes cowardly. Religion-wise, Armara is a quiet true believer. <br><br>Despite sexism against her, Armara has recently been reasonably successful as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Armara lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Armara currently has a silver pearl worth 10gp in her pockets, and  70 Gold 4 Silver 5 Copper to her name. Armara knows Common and Infernal. <br>Armara currently earns  1 Gold per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 1 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Armara lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born in a brothel, and was raised by my mother and father, along with my 3 siblings. I had a modest upbringing in a small house. One parent was a human, the other was a tiefling. I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a merchant</div><div class="descriptive">"I had a bad string of bets which left me with no other choice than to skip town. I spent my youth selling whatever scraps I could find, never got tired of it. I was the village priest but lost my church when a charismatic preacher moved in and converted all my worshipers. I need a sign from heaven to restore my faith. I'm going to prove that I'm worthy of a better life."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...<br>    When I was younger, for a while I did some work as a merchant. Later in my life, I went on a journey to find an ever-raging storm on the peak of a snowy mountain. The most notable physical trait of Sekhmet is that she has a friendly looking face.<br><br>Sekhmet embellishes the truth. When she is relaxed, she is angry. In moments of stress, she becomes caustic. Religion-wise, Sekhmet is a quiet true believer. <br><br>Sekhmet has been having mild success as a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a commoner. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Sekhmet lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Sekhmet currently has a black opal worth 100gp in her pockets, and  110 Gold 1 Silver 6 Copper to her name. Sekhmet knows Common and Infernal. <br>Sekhmet currently earns  1 Gold per day. <table><h3>Finances</h3>     <tr>         <th>Type</th>         <th>Amount</th>     </tr>     <tr><td>Gross Income</td><td> 1 Gold 1 Silver 2 Copper</td></tr>     <tr><td><i>Tax</i></td><td><i> 1 Silver 1 Copper</i></td></tr>     <tr><td>Net Income</td><td> 1 Gold</td></tr>     <tr><td>Total Lifestyle Expenses (<span class="tip dotted" title="Sekhmet lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">modest</span>)</td><td></td></tr>     <tr><td>Profit</td><td></td></tr>           </table><br><br><div class="npcReplace">Early Life</div><div class="descriptive">I was born on the Astral Plane, and was raised by my mother and father as an only child. I had a comfortable upbringing in a rundown shack. One parent was a human, the other was a tiefling. I had a few close friends, and my childhood was a relatively normal one.</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Becoming a merchant</div><div class="descriptive">"I had a bad string of bets which left me with no other choice than to skip town. I grew up poor. I learnt to hock stuff off to feed myself. I got really drunk, fell asleep in a box that got loaded on a boat, and wound up in a big city I've never heard of. My village is so small and secluded I don't even know what country it's in! How do I get home? You have to respect all people"</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time because of a promise, I did some time as a merchant.        I'll always remember the time I was falsely accused of murder, but eventually was acquitted. It took up years of my life, though, and I still get antsy around guards that I don't know.<br>        I came across a famous group of mercenaries when I was spending some time as a commoner.<br> 78697391-6a9a-4159-a1b0-a9bb829638fa.output: <br><span class="first-character">L</span>eah Hazel is <span class="tip dotted" title="46 years old, to be exact.">an early middle aged</span> female half-elf. She is <span class="tip dotted" title="5ft. 10″">average sized</span> and <span class="tip dotted" title="130lbs. (with a BMI of 18)">lithe</span>, and has pale brown eyes with pale skin. The most notable physical trait of Leah is that she has very notcieable knock knees.<br><br>Leah is melodramatic. When she is relaxed, she is agreeable. In moments of stress, she becomes courageous. Religion-wise, Leah is a quiet true believer. <br><br>Perhaps due to sexism, Leah is a <span class="tip dotted" title="Sells and trades goods.">merchant</span>, with a background of being a noble. She belongs to the <span class="tip dotted" title="Leah lives modestly- not without creature comforts of wine and decent food thanks to frugality, though">commoner</span> social class. <br><br>Leah currently has a pouch of ruby powder in her pockets, and  130 Gold 6 Silver 9 Copper to her name. It is my duty to protect and care for the people beneath me."</div><br><div class="npcReplace">Life Events</div><div class="descriptive">Well, I certainly have a tale or two...This one time I met the love of my life, who is no longer with me.
